title: My name is Minh, which means brightness and intelligence.
description: maɪ neɪm ɪz mɪn, wɪʧ minz ˈbraɪtnəs ænd ɪnˈtɛləʤəns.

title: My parents chose it because they wished for me to have a bright and prosperous future.
segments: have a bright and prosperous future
highlight: have a bright and prosperous future
description: maɪ ˈpɛrənts ʧoʊz ɪt bɪˈkɔz ðeɪ wɪʃt fɔr mi tu hæv ə braɪt ænd ˈprɑspərəs ˈfjuʧər.

title: My father chose it because he wished me a life full of joy and good fortune.
segments: a life full of joy and good fortune
highlight: a life full of joy and good fortune
description: maɪ ˈfɑðər ʧoʊz ɪt bɪˈkɔz hi wɪʃt mi ə laɪf fʊl ʌv ʤɔɪ ænd ɡʊd ˈfɔrʧən.

title: My grandmother chose it because she believed I would grow up graceful and intelligent.
description: maɪ ˈɡrændˌmʌðər ʧoʊz ɪt bɪˈkɔz ʃi bɪˈlivd aɪ wʊd ɡroʊ ʌp ˈɡreɪsfəl ænd ɪnˈtɛləʤənt.

title: I'm from Vietnam, a country known for its bustling street food scene and breathtaking mountain landscapes.
description: aɪm frʌm viˌɛtˈnɑm, ə ˈkʌntri noʊn fɔr ɪts ˈbʌsəlɪŋ strit fud sin ænd ˈbrɛθˌteɪkɪŋ ˈmaʊntən ˈlændˌskeɪps.

title: I'm from Vung Tau, a city known for its beautiful beaches and delicious seafood.
description: aɪm frʌm Vung Tau, ə ˈsɪti noʊn fɔr ɪts ˈbjutəfəl ˈbiʧəz ænd dɪˈlɪʃəs ˈsiˌfud.

title: The incredible beauty of the national parks is something I really love.
segments: The incredible beauty of the national parks
highlight: The incredible beauty of the national parks
description: ði ɪnˈkrɛdəbəl ˈbjuti ʌv ðə ˈnæʃənəl pɑrks ɪz ˈsʌmθɪŋ aɪ ˈrɪli lʌv.

title: The youthful energy and continuous development are something I really love.
segments: The youthful energy and continuous development
highlight: The youthful energy and continuous development
description: ðə ˈjuθfəl ˈɛnərʤi ænd kənˈtɪnjuəs dɪˈvɛləpmənt ɑr ˈsʌmθɪŋ aɪ ˈrɪli lʌv.
